name: Run For Your Life
description:
You.
Trash.

The only two things standing between the absolute destruction of the whole dang universe.

Through a myriad of settings familiar and strange, you will collect as much junk as you can find, while beating off hordes of boring zombies, mutated mouth-breathers, and worse stinky horrors yet.

Armed with a genuine homerun baseball bat, you'll have to pull out all the stops to survive and collect all the precious resources in a level.
Our teleporters take time to charge up - get creative until we're able to get you out!

-Set traps and make barricades using your environment. Every object can be moved, repaired, or destroyed.
-Use smaller objects as improvised weapons and projectiles. Send a chair flying into a crowd, instant chaos.
-Exchange junk for better weapons and customize your appearance with unlockable outfits.
-Multiple ways to win! Collect all junk for a faster ride home, barricade yourself like a turtle, or run like a madman.
-Level layouts remain static, but everything inside of them changes between playthroughs. Each run will play differently.

README:

Controls can be changed via the launcher when you first open the game!
